.. _filters_menu:

=======
Filters
=======

A filter is a transform that assigns to every pixel a weighted average of its surrounding pixels.
Different filters differ in how the weights are computed. Because all filters are conceptually very similar, they are grouped together in the submodule :mod:`nd.filters`.
